title: Who played the future guy in Star Trek Enterprise? - Quora

response.answer_text: James Horan played Future Guy, in Enterprise. However, there is a spoiler… For those that don’t want to know about a spoiler about Enterprise, despite it ending 15 years ago, don’t read any further… If Enterprise had continued on for a couple more seasons, Future Guy was actually going to be Jonathan Archer, according to a 2015 tweet, by Brannon Braga.

It’s been a while since I’ve watched Enterprise, but I think you’re referring to Daniels. He was played by Matt Winston. Links below to his Wiki page and the Star Trek wiki page for the character.  Daniels (Crewman) Matt Winston - Wikipedia
